title: Bug 4974: Setting classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When I press the 'Ok' button after setting the output location, I get the following error message: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The issue seems to be that setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations. By setting the output location first, it creates an illegal state.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the project settings 
2. Navigate to the output location settings 
3. Set the output location 
4. Set the classpath 
5. Press the 'Ok' button
